mapper.select: select a2.id,a2.name,identity,sex,tel,teacherType,birthday,undergraduate_school,uschoolname,master_school,mschoolname,doctor_school,dschoolname,composite_index,evaluation from (select staff.id,staff.name,identity,sex,tel,teacherType,birthday,staff.undergraduate_school,school.name as uschoolname,composite_index,evaluation from staff,school,school_type where staff.undergraduate_school = school.id and school.school_type = school_type.id) as a2 left join (select staff.id,school.name as mschoolname,master_school from staff,school,school_type where staff.master_school = school.id and school.school_type = school_type.id) as a1 on a2.id=a1.id left join (select staff.id,school.name as dschoolname,doctor_school from staff,school,school_type where staff.doctor_school = school.id and school.school_type = school_type.id) as a3 on a2.id = a3.id
mapper.insert: insert into staff (name, identity, sex, tel, teacherType, birthday, undergraduate_school, master_school, doctor_school, composite_index, evaluation) values(#{name},#{identity},#{sex},#{tel},#{teacherType},#{birthday},#{undergraduateSchool},#{masterSchool},#{doctorSchool},#{compositeIndex},#{evaluation})
mapper.update:
update staff set
name = #{name},
tel = #{tel},
identity = #{identity},
teacherType = #{teacherType},
sex = #{sex},
birthday = #{birthday},
undergraduate_school = #{undergraduateSchool},
master_school = #{masterSchool},
doctor_school = #{doctorSchool},
evaluation = #{evaluation}
where id = #{id}
